## Problem 1

### Load and clean BRFSS dataset 
```{r get brfss}
data("brfss_smart2010")
```

```{r clean brfss}
brfss_data = brfss_smart2010 %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  filter(topic == "Overall Health") %>% 
  mutate(response = factor(response, levels = c("Excellent", "Very good", "Good", "Fair", "Poor"))) %>% View
```
